channel.title: CVE Feed for jr00ck -- Font Awesome More Icons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for jr00ck -- Font Awesome More Icons

item.title: CVE-2023-5232|2024-08-02T07:52:08.543Z -- jr00ck -- font%20awesome%20more%20icons
item.description: The Font Awesome More Icons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'icon' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 3.5 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
